Room.Name: Thieve's Guild
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the meeting room of some very high level thieves.
Room.LongDescription: Only seasoned adventurers are allowed in here, and training classes are conducted for mid-level thieves in the side rooms. At the moment, all master training thieves are either serving time or out on a job, so if you want to advance in level without a fight, this is your lucky day. Just go to the training room and pickup your advancement.
